content: In Bagalkot, where residents staged protest on Friday night over the arrest of Hindutva activists, a conciliation peace meeting was held on Saturday in which P.C. Gaddigoudar, MP, former MLA Viranna Charantimath, senior police officials and residents of Killa Galli took part and it was resolved to maintain peace

content: The superior quality granite that had been laid in the traditional style need to be preserved carefully, says a temple statement

title: II PU student dies of heart attack
content: In a tragic incident, a girl student who was about to appear for her II year PUC examination died of heart attack as she was getting ready to go to the examination hall in Belagavi district on Saturday.

content: Scores of protesters took to the streets in Kashmir‚Äôs Bandipora to show support for Iran and condemn the attack on it by raising pro-Iran slogans; similar scenes were witnessed in Budgam and Srinagar districts

content: Priest accused of sexually assaulting a minor under the pretext of performing rituals to ‚Äòdrive away evil spirits‚Äô

content: The move comes amid speculations that the BJP plans to field Union Minister George Kurian from the Assembly seat; Mr. Antony is the AICC secretary in charge of Meghalaya, Mizoram, and Arunachal Pradesh

title: ISRO chairman lauds space scientist B.N. Suresh‚Äôs contribution to Indian space programme
content: ISRO chairman V. Narayanan released the Kannada translation of B.N. Suresh‚Äôs biography in Shivamogga on Saturday

title: KSWMP launches ‚ÄòClean Kerala Anthem‚Äô
content: The anthem is designed to engage all age groups, especially the youth, with the message ‚ÄúMy Waste, My Responsibility; My Kerala, My Pride‚Äù. It encourages a cultural shift towards responsible waste management and segregation.

title: Telangana urges KRMB to stop A.P. from taking up new projects, expansions
content: ENC terms river board‚Äôs letter to TG ‚Äúwholly untenable and misplaced‚Äù, while turning blind on AP‚Äôs new projects, expansions

title: NWKRTC to be named after Rani Chennamma soon, says Minister Ramalinga Reddy
content: The Minister has issued appointment orders to the newly recruited employees and awarded silver medals to drivers for accident-free driving

content: It was earlier rumoured that the veteran leader may not contest due to health concerns. The party faced major setbacks in the local body election in Idukki, prompting a rethink

title: Kochi Corporation mulls short-term direct operation of Ro-Ro services before engaging new operator
content: Citing mounting losses, the civic body is weighing interim control before entrusting the service to a new agency. The Budget for 2026‚Äì27 has proposed forming a special purpose vehicle to manage operations, drawing criticism from the LDF over alleged privatisation

content: The special campaign will run in mission mode over a three-month period, during which eligible girls can receive the vaccine daily at designated facilities

title: SEBI chief, Canada FM hold talks on boosting institutional investment, regulatory ties
content: ‚ÄúThe two sides discussed how both sides can further facilitate institutional investments, strengthen regulatory collaboration, and other issues of mutual interests,‚Äù SEBI said in a post on X

title: 7th Marathi-Malayali Ethnic Fest concludes in Mumbai
content: The event showcased a vibrant fusion of traditions, bringing together thousands of students and artists to strengthen national integration through art and literature

title: Free speech on social media comes with responsibility, says Supreme Court judge
content: Justice J.K. Maheshwari says individuals must act responsibly online as platform algorithms prioritise profit over potential harm; experts call for victim centric approach to tackle social media abuse

title: Surprise visits, GPS monitoring to strengthen SSLC preparation
content: 19,479 students to write SSLC exam in Mandya district; wardens warned, special classes ordered to improve SSLC results

title: Khamenei killed in US strike: Who are his potential successors?
content: US President Donald Trump announced Iran's Supreme Leader Khamenei's death following joint US-Israeli strikes, calling it a chance for Iranians to reclaim their nation.  Israeli officials confirmed the death, with Iranian state media reporting explosions and disruptions in Tehran.  The succession process, tightly controlled by the regime, now faces scrutiny amid regional tensions.

title: Exiled crown prince hails ‚Äòturning point‚Äô after Ayatollah‚Äôs death - top developments
content: A massive cloud of smoke rose over Tehran following a daylight "preventive attack" by the United States and Israel, targeting military sites near Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei's offices. Loud blasts were heard as the US confirmed its participation in the strikes, hours after President Trump expressed dissatisfaction with nuclear talks and hinted at a "big decision"

title: New SIM-binding rule from March 1: WhatsApp, Telegram users must know these changes
content: Starting March 1, messaging apps like WhatsApp and Telegram must implement SIM-binding, requiring services to function only with the registered SIM in the primary device. This government mandate aims to curb online fraud and enhance traceability by linking active accounts to verified SIMs. Web versions will also face stricter auto-logout rules.

title: Question that Bill Gates' daughter Phoebe Gates asks every candidate she interviews
content: Phoebe Gates, co-CEO of AI shopping assistant Phia, reveals her unique interview question: 'How much do you think California state spends on healthcare? And do a bottoms-up approach for how you would build that out.' This assesses problem-solving, not just facts. She also seeks dedication by asking about the 'craziest' sales deal closure.

title: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy has a five-word reply for Jack Dorsey firing half of its staff
content: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy says he hasn't "really digested" Jack Dorsey's decision to lay off 4,000 employees ‚Äî nearly half of Block's workforce ‚Äî citing AI-driven efficiency gains. Jassy acknowledges that many jobs humans have done for decades won't need as many people going forward, but struck an optimistic note, saying new roles will emerge as they have with every past technology shift. He called it a "transition" period.

title: Iran-Israel: Drone hits residential building in Bahrain- video
content: Bahrain's capital Manama faced attacks on residential buildings. An Iranian drone struck a tower in the city. This follows Iran's missile strikes on United States military bases in Bahrain and other Gulf nations. The strikes were in retaliation for joint US-Israel airstrikes on Tehran. Civil defense teams are responding to the incidents.

title: US-Israel strikes on Iran: How will India be hit by Strait of Hormuz closure? Explained
content: The Strait of Hormuz has Iran on the northern side and the UAE and Oman on the southern side. It extends for around 100 miles, and its narrowest stretch is 21 miles wide. It has shallow depth, which means that ships passing through it are vulnerable to naval mines.

title: Pakistan beat Sri Lanka but crash out of T20 World Cup; NZ enter semis on NRR
content: Pakistan's T20 World Cup journey ended despite a thrilling five-run victory over Sri Lanka. Needing to restrict Sri Lanka to 147 or less, Pakistan's bowlers conceded 207, falling short on net run rate. New Zealand secured the semifinal spot. Sahibzada Farhan's century was a highlight for Pakistan.

title: Fortnite Love and Legends Power Hour event: Release timings for all regions
content: Epic Games announced the final two Fortnite Love and Legends Power Hour events for February 28 and March 1, 2026. These events offer the most generous loot distribution, featuring four Legendary POIs per match with Rare Chests. Players have a final chance to earn Candy Hearts and themed cosmetic items during these limited-time, one-hour events.

title: Matthew Tkachuk calls Edmonton Oilers captain Connor McDavid best player in the world
content: Florida Panthers forward Matthew Tkachuk called Edmonton Oilers captain Connor McDavid the best player in the world after their Olympic gold medal showdown at the Milano Cortina 2026 Winter Games. Tkachuk reflected on a pivotal breakaway save by United States goaltender Connor Hellebuyck that preserved Team USA‚Äôs lead and shifted momentum in the championship game.

title: Toronto Maple Leafs face trade deadline pressure amid Auston Matthews scrutiny
content: As the NHL trade deadline approaches, the Toronto Maple Leafs are unsure about the direction of their roster and their captain, Auston Matthews; as rumors about NHL trades grow stronger, management needs to find a balance between being competitive in the short term and planning for the long term. This week is going to be very important for the NHL. Along with a lot of big news coming out. There are questions about player availability, locker room dynamics, and Matthews' future.

title: Air India cancels 28 Europe, US, Canada flights on March 1 amid Middle East tensions
content: Air India has cancelled 28 international flights to Europe, the US, and Canada on March 1st due to the escalating Middle East situation.  The airline cited safety concerns for passengers and staff following coordinated strikes in the region. Affected travelers are being notified and offered alternative arrangements to minimize disruption.

title: US‚ÄìIsrael strikes Iran: Indian embassies in UAE, Syria issue safety advisories for nationals tensions escalate
content: Indian embassies in the UAE and Syria have issued urgent advisories for nationals to exercise caution due to escalating Middle East tensions following US and Israeli strikes on Iran.  Stranded passengers are being assisted, while citizens in Syria are urged to avoid non-essential travel and remain vigilant amid reported counterattacks and significant casualties.

title: US, Israel attack Iran: Videos show explosion at Dubai's iconic Palm Jumeirah
content: An explosion and smoke plume were reported at Dubai's Palm Jumeirah on Saturday, injuring four people. This incident occurred amidst heightened regional tensions following Iran's retaliatory strikes across the Gulf. Dubai authorities confirmed a fire at a building, which has since been controlled. The event caused concern in the city known for luxury and tourism.

title: ‚ÄòNo ship allowed‚Äô: Iran blocks Strait of Hormuz; US issues advisory after strike
content: Vessels transiting the Strait of Hormuz are reportedly receiving radio warnings, attributed to Iran's Revolutionary Guards, stating passage is prohibited. This critical oil route, vital for global energy supplies, faces heightened tensions following recent regional strikes. Iran has not officially confirmed issuing such an order, raising concerns for commercial shipping.

title: Satellite image shows impact of US-Israel strike on Iran Supreme Leader Khamenei's palace
content: Several key structures within the compound, long used as Khamenei's primary official residence and a central hub for leadership functions, appear obliterated or severely compromised. Iran struck American military bases across the Middle East in retaliatory strikes against Israel and the United States, hours after the two arch-rivals rocked Tehran Saturday morning.

title: Government directs cricketing body to drop 'India' or 'Indian' from name; here's why
content: Sports Ministry has directed the Differently-Abled Cricket Council of India (DCCI) to cease using "India" or "Indian" in its name and activities, as it lacks National Sports Federation (NSF) recognition. Similar notices were issued to other sports bodies. DCCI seeks NSF status, highlighting its international events and BCCI backing.

title: Bored of Peace? Half of Donald Trump's Board of Peace is at war
content: Donald Trump‚Äôs grandly titled Board of Peace was supposed to be a Trumpian alternative to the United Nations, promising order, stability, and the end of endless wars. Instead, it resembles a Yes Minister casting call where the least qualified are handed the grandest titles. Nearly half its members are now entangled in active military escalation, from US-Israel strikes on Iran to Pakistan‚Äôs growing confrontation with the Taliban. The result is an institution dedicated to peace whose members are too busy exchanging missiles to practise it. Like many international bodies before it, the Board of Peace demonstrates that peace, as ever, remains largely aspirational branding.

title: Why was Oman spared as Iran targeted Gulf states after US‚ÄìIsrael strikes
content: Missile strikes rocked the Gulf following US-Israeli actions against Iran, hitting Bahrain, Kuwait, Qatar, the UAE, and Saudi Arabia.  Oman, however, remained untouched. This neutrality, coupled with its crucial role as a diplomatic intermediary between Tehran and Washington, likely protected it from retaliation, preserving a vital, albeit fragile, communication line amidst escalating tensions.

title: Family full of pride make room to watch son Auqib make Ranji history
content: In Sheeri village near the Line of Control, residents gathered anxiously to follow the Ranji Trophy final as local boy Auqib Nabi Dar played. Inside his modest home, family members watched silently until Jammu & Kashmir won and Auqib was named Player of the Tournament. His father, once keen on a medical career for him, now proudly dreams of seeing him in the Indian jersey.

title: How flights moved out of Iranian airspace after US-Israel strikes ‚Äî video
content: Commercial flights rerouted as US and Israel conducted coordinated strikes across Iran, including Tehran, following multiple explosions. Defence Minister Israel Katz termed it a 'pre-emptive' move. President Trump confirmed US involvement, aiming to curb Iran's nuclear program. Iran subsequently launched retaliatory strikes targeting Israel and US facilities, impacting several regional nations.

title: Pakistan's Farhan and Fakhar Zaman run riot; break these batting records at Pallekele
content: Fakhar Zaman and Sahibzada Farhan etched their names in T20 World Cup history with a record 176-run opening stand against Sri Lanka. This monumental partnership propelled Pakistan to a commanding 212, setting a challenging target.  Pakistan's bowlers now face the crucial task of restricting Sri Lanka to secure a semi-final berth.

title: 50+ Happy Holi wishes, messages and greetings, WhatsApp status for Holi 2026
content: India's vibrant Holi festival, celebrated in spring, embodies love and camaraderie.  Marked by smearing colors and splashing water, it's a time for families and friends to unite, sharing wishes for happiness and prosperity.  The spirit of "Bura Na Mano Holi Hai" encourages lighthearted fun, making it a joyous occasion for all.

title: Iran targets Qatar: Falling missile debris creates panic in Doha ‚Äì Watch
content: Panic erupted on the outskirts of Qatar's capital, Doha, as rocket debris fell, causing a large explosion. This incident occurred amidst retaliatory strikes by Iran targeting Israel and US facilities, following earlier attacks on Iran. The event highlights the growing risk of regional conflict spillover, with Qatar hosting a key US military base and having condemned the attack.

title: Farhan surpasses Virat Kohli, becomes highest ever to score this record
content: Sahibzada Farhan broke Virat Kohli‚Äôs record for most runs in a single T20 World Cup edition during Pakistan‚Äôs must-win Super 8 clash against Sri Lanka. Kohli had scored 319 runs in 2014. Farhan‚Äôs fluent knock powered Pakistan to 150 without loss alongside Fakhar Zaman, keeping their semifinal hopes alive with a strong start.

title: US-Israel strike Iran: Why Strait of Hormuz matters for oil prices - explained
content: Escalating US-Iran tensions, including strikes and retaliation, have reignited concerns over the vital Strait of Hormuz. This narrow passage, crucial for global oil trade, faces potential disruption, threatening to send crude prices soaring. India, heavily reliant on Middle Eastern oil, could face significant economic impact if the strait is closed.

title: 'Obama will attack': Trump‚Äôs old tweet resurfaces after US-Israeli strikes
content: Explosions rocked Tehran after US-Israeli strikes, reviving Donald Trump's 2013 tweet predicting Obama would attack Iran. Now, with "Operation Epic Fury" targeting Iran and Tehran retaliating, Trump's past accusations of using Iran for political gain echo.

title: 'It is a proud moment': PM Modi celebrates J&K's maiden Ranji triumph
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi congratulated Jammu & Kashmir on their maiden Ranji Trophy win, calling it a proud moment for the region. Cricket legends including Sachin Tendulkar, Jay Shah, Mohammad Kaif, Irfan Pathan, Aakash Chopra, Shikhar Dhawan, Harbhajan Singh, Yuvraj Singh and Suresh Raina praised the team‚Äôs grit, belief and historic achievement.

title: Watch: Israel releases first footage of strikes in Iran
content: Israel has released footage of its military strikes on Iran, marking a significant escalation. The coordinated operation with the US targeted Iranian military sites and infrastructure. Iran retaliated with missile launches towards Israel, prompting defensive actions and widespread airspace closures. Regional governments urge caution as tensions surge.

title: Iran strikes disrupt flights: Aviation min reviews situation; what IndiGo, Air India said
content: Several flights to the Middle East have been cancelled already. The Civil Aviation Minister conducted a detailed review of preparedness and response arrangements in coordination with all relevant stakeholders.

title: US-Iran tensions: Who are the men steering the storm in Middle East
content: The United States and Israel launched strikes against Iran, killing at least 40 people amid nuclear program negotiations and protests. President Trump warned Iranian forces to surrender or face death, while Supreme Leader Khamenei vowed resistance. The conflict escalates with key players like Benjamin Netanyahu and Reza Pahlavi involved.

title: Why Babar Azam is not playing do-or-die PAK vs SL Super 8 clash?
content: Pakistan dropped Babar Azam for their must-win Super 8 clash against Sri Lanka in the T20 World Cup 2026, citing poor form after he scored 91 runs in six matches. Skipper Salman Agha confirmed three changes at the toss. Pakistan must beat Sri Lanka by 64 runs to qualify after England topped the group and New Zealand sit second.

title: Iran attacks US military bases across Middle East in operation 'Truthful Promise 4'
content: The Revolutionary Guard said in a statement that in the first phase of the operation, named ‚ÄúTruthful Promise 4,‚Äù Iran‚Äôs military struck the command of the US 5th Fleet in Bahrain, as well as US bases in Qatar and the United Arab Emirates and military targets in Israel. However, the extent of the damage at the headquarters of the United States Fifth Fleet was not immediately clear. The base lies just southeast of central Manama, capital of the island nation of Bahrain.

title: Matt Holliday's Stillwater estate listed for $12 million
content: a Stillwater, Oklahoma, home that once belonged to an MLB champion and seven-time All-Star is on the market at $12 million . the home features sports-related amenities such as a professionally lit baseball field in the front yard, a putting green in the backyard, and a $2 million, two-level swimming pool . indoor batting cages, pickleball and basketball courts reside in a detached $150,000 guest home on the property .

title: NFL Players Association releases 2026 team report cards
content: ESPN obtained the results of the NFL Players Association's 2026 report cards . it grades franchises from A-plus to F-minus on everything from ownership to treatment of families . all players who were on a 2025 roster at the time of the survey were eligible to participate .

title: The game that will define the 2026 season for every power-conference team
content: the season-defining game will be for all 68 power-conference teams in 2026 . peruse BC's schedule given last year's struggles, and it's tough to find many wins . the Eagles open on the road at Cincinnati, then play FCS Maine .

title: Men's Bubble Watch: Kentucky, Clemson add key wins on loaded Saturday slate
content: the 2026 men's NCAA tournament is rapidly approaching . teams have roughly two weeks until selection Sunday to strengthen their cases . we'll use a variety of metrics as guides, classifying teams based on how likely they are to make the field of 68 .

title: Power Rankings: Stakes are high for UCLA, two teams rejoin the list
content: the Bruins will be just the fourth program to finish with a perfect regular season in the Big Ten women's college basketball . the last to do it was Maryland in 2015, the season the Terps joined the big Ten and advanced to the final Four for the second year in a row .

title: Does anyone beat Ohtani? Buster Olney ranks the top 10 designated hitters
content: coach Buster Olney ranked the best of the best at designated hitters . the goal of this exercise is to identify the best players for the 2026 season, not who might be best in five years or over their career . we rolled out a position per day over two weeks .

title: Bracketology: Florida rejoins the 2-seed line
content: Content extraction failed.

title: How the top QB signings will fit in 2026
content: the top 2026 recruits at each position could fit at their new schools . the perfect harmony between skill and scheme can lead to production and wins on the field . this is the most high-profile prospect Houston has signed in the modern era .

title: "Khamenei, One Of The Most Evil People In History, Is Dead": Donald Trump
content: Hours after the US-Israel's joint military operation, US President Donald Trump said on Saturday that Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah was dead.

title: Lift Plunges From Bhopal Building Days After Body Found In Shaft, 2 Injured
content: Days after a 77-year-old man's decomposed body was found inside an elevator shaft, another lift accident has been reported at Chinar Dream Cityin Bhopal.

title: Photo Of Khamenei's Body Shown To Trump, Netanyahu: Israeli Media
content: Two Israeli television networks reported that a photograph of Iran's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei's body had been shown to US President Donald Trump and...

title: "There Are Many Signs" Iran Supreme Leader Khamenei Is Dead, Says Netanyahu
content: The Israeli prime minister was addressing reporters hours after the US and Israel carried out strikes on Iran.

title: Man Killed, Body Burnt And Buried Over Land Dispute In Gujarat's Morbi
content: In a chilling revelation that has rattled the industrial hub of Gujarat's Morbi, local police have unearthed a gruesome conspiracy involving kidnapping, murder and an attempt to destroy evidence.

title: Ahead Of Iran Attack, CIA Assessed Khamenei Would Be Replaced If Killed
content: In the run-up to the US and Israeli attacks on Saturday, the US Central Intelligence Agency assessed that even if Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei was killed in the operation, he would likely be replaced by hardline figures from the IRGC.

title: US-Israel Attacks Iran LIVE Updates: Signs Khamenei Has Been Killed, Says Israel PM Netanyahu
content: US-Israel Attacks Iran LIVE Updates: Israel launched a daylight attack Saturday on Iran's capital, with a cloud of smoke rising from the city's downtown. The apparent strike happened near the offices of Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.

title: Arvind Kejriwal To Hold Rally At Jantar Mantar On Sunday
content: AAP national convenor Arvind Kejriwal will hold a public meeting at Jantar Mantar on Sunday, his first since he was discharged from the liquor policy case by a court.

title: UK Warplanes Played No Role In Strikes On Iran, Only "Defensive Operations"
content: Prime Minister Keir Starmer said Saturday British warplanes were involved in "defensive operations" in Middle East skies but the UK had "played no role" in the US-Israeli attack on Iran.

title: Oil Tankers Avoid Strait Of Hormuz After Naval Warnings Follow US Strikes
content: Oil and gas tankers are increasingly avoiding the Hormuz shipping strait that links the oil-rich Persian Gulf to the open seas after the US and Israel bombed Iran.

title: Explosion At The Palm In Dubai, Smoke Seen Rising From Building
content: An explosion has been reported at the Palm Jumeirah area, the iconic man-made island in Dubai, as Iran launched strikes in the Gulf region in retaliation against US and Israeli attacks.

title: First Visual Of US-Israel Strike On Iran Supreme Leader Khamenei's Compound
content: Iran's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei was the target of Saturday'sjoint Israeli-US strikes on Tehran, Israel's public broadcaster reported.

title: Dubai's Burj Khalifa Hit By Iran Missile? Video Shows Explosion Near World's Tallest Building
content: A video has surfaced showing an explosion and smoke near the world's tallest building in Dubai as Iran retaliated against US and Israeli strikes.

title: Indians In Israel To Be Evacuated Via Egypt Or Jordan: Indian Envoy To NDTV
content: India will try to bring home its nationals who are stranded in Israel "the moment there's a window available", amid the rapid escalation of hostilities with Iran, India's Ambassador to Israel JP Singh told NDTV.

title: Missile Attack On US Navy Base In Bahrain As Chaos Grips Middle East
content: The United States' base in Bahrain has witnessed a missile attack as the Middle East plunges into a security nightmare after the US and Israel launched attacks on Iran.

title: From Weak Successor To Iran's Ruthless Leader: A Look At Khamenei's Rise
content: Among the first targets in US and Israeli strikes on Iran on Saturday was the headquarters of Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, an inveterate foe of the West who has crushed internal opposition while supporting proxy forces across the region.

title: Iran Sends Its Cheap And Best 'Shahed' Drones At Expensive Targets
content: Iran is seeing the results of focussed investments on developing military drones as its Shahed series including loitering munitions were seen in the skies above Dubai. One such drone reportedly hit an area in the city; locals have shared visuals.

title: 18 Killed In Massive Explosion At Andhra Fireworks Factory
content: An explosion at a fireworks manufacturing unit in Andhra Pradesh's Kakinada district on Saturday killed at least 18 people.

title: Trump Was Told Iran Attack Was 'High Risk, High Reward' Ahead Of Strikes
content: Ahead of the US attack on Iran, Donald Trump received briefings that not only delivered blunt assessments about the risk of major US casualties but also touted the prospect of a generational shift in the Middle East in favor of US interests.

title: Preview: Who will book their tickets to WrestleMania 42?
content: the ring is surrounded by a steel structure, covering it from the floor up to a metal roof . there is a glass booth stationed in each corner of a ring that will contain four eventual participants . unlike on "Love Is Blind," no one is expecting to meet their soulmate outside of the pods .

title: 20 dead, most of them women, in Andhra Pradesh's worst firecracker unit explosion
content: a massive explosion occurred at a firecracker manufacturing unit at Vetlapalem village in Andhra Pradesh's Kakinada district on Saturday afternoon . the toll could rise as many of the injured were unlikely to survive . most of the workers in the unit were women from nearby villages .

title: Is Middle East entering a new phase of multipolar confrontation?
content: the united states and Israel launched coordinated airstrikes on Iran on saturday . they targeted military sites across the country in what both governments described as a pre-emptive operation . retaliatory missile strikes were reported across Tehran, with the Israeli military stressed it was targeting military sites .
